scripts.docker:prisma:generate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml run --rm server-api yarn prisma:generate
scripts.docker:migrate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml run --rm server-api yarn migrate:dev
scripts.docker:seed: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml run --rm server-api yarn seed
scripts.docker:prisma:studio: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml run server-api -d yarn prisma:studio
scripts.docker:test:seed: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm server-api yarn seed
scripts.docker:test:migrate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm server-api yarn migrate:dev
scripts.docker:test:run: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm server-api yarn test
